item.title: How I Play D&D Using Linux Native Tools
item.description: Why Linux? I use Linux as my primary operating system purely as personal preference. If you’ve looked at my previous post you’ll know I prefer to use Tiling Window Managers these days and honestly using Windows 10 or even MacOS just feels…. wrong to me. So allow me a momnent before I dig into these tools I need to make the disclaimer that they aren’t all open source or even free.

item.title: Legend of the Black Swords
item.description: Interesting how things turn out right? Well in case you’re curious, I’ve been playing a lot of Dungeons and Dragons and my d&d games are streamed live on twitch every Saturday from 7pm to 11pm EST.
